title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should remain the same after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the report parameter settings.  
2. Set a default value for the list box.  
3. Modify the default value.  
4. Save the changes.  
5. Close and reopen the report parameter settings.  
6. Verify that the default value is lost and does not match the modified value.
